title: tidy: Remove from EXCEPTIONS list if it is no longer used.

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Tidy locally failed with these errors:

```console
$ ./x.py test src/tools/tidy
```
